price: Wanasema: Ushindi huu ni lini, kama mnasema kweli?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Na washirikina wanakwambia wewe na Waumini: Wakati gani Mwenyezi Mungu atakufungulieni mpate ushindi? Twambieni wakati wake ikiwa nyinyi ni wasema kweli.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
